Home

Welcome to the Cal Robotics Team website!

We design, fabricate, and program robots for both recreation and competition. Our first mission this year will be creating a large combat robot for Robogames 2016, and we'll be adding more epic projects soon!

Feel free to email us if you want to join our mailing list!

© 2015 Cal Robotics. Please email ucbrobotics@gmail.com for general inquiries.
